p: The oncogenic mutation of the BRAF‐gene is well described in canine transitional cell carcinomas (TCC) of the urinary bladder and urethra (Mochizuki et al. 2015, Aupperle‐Lellbach et al. 2018, 2019). This study investigates the prevalence of BRAF‐mutation in carcinomas distributed over the whole canine urinary tract.
